title: tilt workflow
code: library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE) library(readr, warn.conflicts = FALSE) library(tidyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE) # devtools::install_github("2DegreesInvesting/tiltIndicatorAfter") library(tiltIndicatorAfter)

what: tiltIndicatorAfter data common for all indicators
title: tilt workflow
text: ep_companies, ei_activities_overview, mapper_ep_ei, ei_input_data, isic_4digit_name five datasets used input tiltIndicatorAfter package. output tiltIndicatorBefore package. five datasets used adding additional data four indicators (Emissions profile, Emissions profile upstream, Sector profile, Sector profile upstream).
code: # ep_companies europages_campanies <- read_csv("/path/ep_companies.csv") |>   select("company_name", "country", "company_city", "postcode", "address", "main_activity", "companies_id")  # ecoinvent_activities ei_activities_ov <- read_csv("/path/ei_activities_overview.csv")  # matches_mapper mapper_ep_ei <- read_csv("/path/mapper_ep_ei.csv")  # ecoinvent_inputs ei_input <- read_csv("/path/ei_input_data.csv") |>   select("input_activity_uuid_product_uuid", "exchange_name", "exchange_unit_name") |>   distinct()  # isic_4digit_name isic_4digit_name <- read_csv("/path/isic_4digit_name.csv")

title: tilt workflow
text: input data Emissions_profile comes tiltIndicatorBefore package becomes input tiltIndicator package.
code: # emissions_profile companies ep_company <- read_csv("/path/emissions_profile_any_companies_ecoinvent.csv")  # emissions_profile products ep_product <- read_csv("/path/emissions_profile_products_ecoinvent.csv")

what: Create Emissions_profile product and company level outputs
title: tilt workflow
text: code takes output tiltIndicator use input tiltIndicatorAfter package.
code: emissions_profile <- profile_emissions(ep_company,   ep_product,   europages_companies = europages_campanies,   ecoinvent_activities = ei_activities_ov,   ecoinvent_europages = mapper_ep_ei,   isic_tilt = isic_4digit_name,   low_threshold = 1 / 3,   high_threshold = 2 / 3 )  emissions_profile_at_product_level <- emissions_profile |> unnest_product() emissions_profile_at_company_level <- emissions_profile |> unnest_company()

what: Save the Emissions profile final results
title: tilt workflow
tilt workflow
text: input data Emissions Profile Upstream comes tiltIndicatorBefore package becomes input tiltIndicator package.

what: Create Emissions profile upstream product and company level outputs
title: tilt workflow
text: code takes output tiltIndicator use input tiltIndicatorAfter package.
code: emissions_profile_upstream <- profile_emissions_upstream(epu_company,   epu_product,   europages_companies = europages_campanies,   ecoinvent_activities = ei_activities_ov,   ecoinvent_inputs = ei_input,   ecoinvent_europages = mapper_ep_ei,   isic_tilt = isic_4digit_name,   low_threshold = 1 / 3,   high_threshold = 2 / 3 )  emissions_profile_upstream_at_product_level <- emissions_profile_upstream |> unnest_product() emissions_profile_upstream_at_company_level <- emissions_profile_upstream |> unnest_company()

what: Save the Emissions profile upstream final results
title: tilt workflow
tilt workflow
text: input data Sector Profile comes tiltIndicatorBefore package becomes input tiltIndicator package.

what: Create Sector profile product and company level outputs
title: tilt workflow
text: code takes output tiltIndicator use input tiltIndicatorAfter package.
code: sector_profile <- profile_sector(sp_company,   sp_scenarios,   europages_companies = europages_campanies,   ecoinvent_activities = ei_activities_ov,   ecoinvent_europages = mapper_ep_ei,   isic_tilt = isic_4digit_name,   low_threshold = 1 / 3,   high_threshold = 2 / 3 )  sector_profile_at_product_level <- sector_profile |> unnest_product() sector_profile_at_company_level <- sector_profile |> unnest_company()

what: Save the Sector profile final results
title: tilt workflow
tilt workflow
text: input data Sector profile upstream comes tiltIndicatorBefore package becomes input tiltIndicator package.

what: Create Sector profile upstream product and company level outputs.
title: tilt workflow
text: code takes output tiltIndicator use input tiltIndicatorAfter package.
code: sector_profile_upstream <- profile_sector_upstream(spu_company,   spu_scenarios,   spu_product,   europages_companies = europages_campanies,   ecoinvent_activities = ei_activities_ov,   ecoinvent_inputs = ei_input,   ecoinvent_europages = mapper_ep_ei,   isic_tilt = isic_4digit_name,   low_threshold = 1 / 3,   high_threshold = 2 / 3 )  sector_profile_upstream_at_product_level <- sector_profile_upstream |> unnest_product() sector_profile_upstream_at_company_level <- sector_profile_upstream |> unnest_company()

title: Use a workflow file — use_workflow
text: Creates workflow file template tiltWorkflows package.

title: Use a workflow file — use_workflow
text: template Path template file relative templates/ directory within package; see details. save_as Path file create, relative root active project. Defaults template open Open newly created file editing? Happens RStudio, applicable, via utils::file.edit() otherwise.

title: Use a workflow file — use_workflow
text: logical vector indicating file modified.

title: Use a workflow file — use_workflow
code: if (FALSE) { # Note: running this will write `NEWS.md` to your working directory use_workflow() }

title: tiltWorkflows 0.0.0.9003 (2023-12-07)
text: Depend tiltIndicatorAfter (#7). makes tiltWorkflows user friendly since ’s package users need install use – everything else happens behind hoods.

title: tiltWorkflows 0.0.0.9002 (2023-12-07)
text: New use_workflow() helps users create workflow file template (#5).

title: tiltWorkflows 0.0.0.9001 (2023-12-06)
text: New article “Get started” (#4 @kalashsinghal).
